item.title: Here are 11 things Trump has promised to carry out on Day 1 of his presidency
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has promised significant changes when he takes office on everything from immigration to foreign policy to tariffs.

item.title: Ozempic is in the next round of Medicare drug price negotiations. See the full list of 15 medications
item.description: The talks on drugs including Novo Nordisk's Wegovy, GSK's Trelegy Ellipta, and Pfizer's Xtandi will set Medicare prices that go into effect in 2027.

item.title: DOJ sues Walgreens, alleging it 'knowingly' filled millions of prescriptions that lacked legitimate medical purposes
item.description: Some Walgreens patients died of overdose shortly after getting invalid prescriptions filled at Walgreens, the DOJ alleges in the new lawsuit.

item.title: Sam Altman posts letter from senators concerned about OpenAI efforts to 'cozy up' to Trump
item.description: On his X account, Sam Altman posted a letter signed by Democratic senators concerned about the ways tech companies appear to be bending to Trump's wis...

item.title: Investors have been betting on the Trump bump. Now they'll get clarity on what's actually possible
item.description: Wall Street is about to get confirmation on what the president-elect will actually do in connection with tariffs and other campaign promises.
